title: Estimote
description: Estimote is a company in the IoT industry known for its diverse and vibrant color palette. The colors 6A9C84 (green), 790F59 (fuchsia), 373B9C (blue), F784B6 (pink), 39B7DD (cyan), and CCC900 (yellow) represent the company's innovative and modern branding approach. These colors are part of Estimote's visual identity, and can be primarily found on their official website and press kit.
